P0.description: Port 0 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 0 pins.

P1.description: Port 1 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 1 pins.

P2.description: Port 2 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 2 pins.

P3.description: Port 3 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 3 pins.

P4.description: Port 4 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 4 pins.

P5.description: Port 5 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 5 pins.

P6.description: Port 6 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 6 pins.

P7.description: Port 7 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 7 pins.

P12.description: Port 12 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 12 pins.

P13.description: Port 13 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 13 pins.

P14.description: Port 14 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 14 pins.

P15.description: Port 15 Register, controls the data output/input of Port 15 pins.

GPIO_PM0.description: Port 0 Mode Register, configures pins P0.0-P0.1 as input or output.

GPIO_PM1.description: Port 1 Mode Register, configures pins P1.0-P1.7 as input or output.

GPIO_PM2.description: Port 2 Mode Register, configures pins P2.0-P2.4 as input or output.

GPIO_PM3.description: Port 3 Mode Register, configures pin P3.0 as input or output.

GPIO_PM4.description: Port 4 Mode Register, configures pins P4.0-P4.1 as input or output.

GPIO_PM5.description: Port 5 Mode Register, configures pin P5.0 as input or output.

GPIO_PM6.description: Port 6 Mode Register, configures pins P6.0-P6.1 as input or output.

GPIO_PM7.description: Port 7 Mode Register, configures pins P7.0-P7.7 as input or output.

GPIO_PM12.description: Port 12 Mode Register, configures pin P12.0 as input or output.

GPIO_PM13.description: Port 13 Mode Register, configures pin P13.0 as input or output.

GPIO_PM14.description: Port 14 Mode Register, configures pins P14.0-P14.1 as input or output.

GPIO_PM15.description: Port 15 Mode Register, configures pins P15.0-P15.1 as input or output.

GPIO_PU0.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 0, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 0 pins.

GPIO_PU1.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 1, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 1 pins.

GPIO_PU2.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 2, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 2 pins.

GPIO_PU3.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 3, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 3 pins.

GPIO_PU4.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 4, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 4 pins.

GPIO_PU5.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 5, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 5 pins.

GPIO_PU6.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 6, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 6 pins.

GPIO_PU7.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 7, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 7 pins.

GPIO_PU12.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 12, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 12 pins.

GPIO_PU13.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 13, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 13 pins.

GPIO_PU14.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 14, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 14 pins.

GPIO_PU15.description: Pull-Up Resistor Option Register 15, enables/disables pull-up resistors for Port 15 pins.

GPIO_PIM0.description: Port Input Mode Register 0, selects input buffer mode for Port 0 pins.

GPIO_PIM1.description: Port Input Mode Register 1, selects input buffer mode for Port 1 pins.

GPIO_PIM5.description: Port Input Mode Register 5, selects input buffer mode for Port 5 pins.

GPIO_PIM7.description: Port Input Mode Register 7, selects input buffer mode for Port 7 pins.

GPIO_PIM13.description: Port Input Mode Register 13, selects input buffer mode for Port 13 pins.

GPIO_PIM15.description: Port Input Mode Register 15, selects input buffer mode for Port 15 pins.

GPIO_POM0.description: Port Output Mode Register 0, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 0 pins.

GPIO_POM1.description: Port Output Mode Register 1, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 1 pins.

GPIO_POM2.description: Port Output Mode Register 2, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 2 pins.

GPIO_POM3.description: Port Output Mode Register 3, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 3 pins.

GPIO_POM4.description: Port Output Mode Register 4, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 4 pins.

GPIO_POM5.description: Port Output Mode Register 5, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 5 pins.

GPIO_POM6.description: Port Output Mode Register 6, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 6 pins.

GPIO_POM7.description: Port Output Mode Register 7, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 7 pins.

GPIO_POM12.description: Port Output Mode Register 12, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 12 pins.

GPIO_POM13.description: Port Output Mode Register 13, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 13 pins.

GPIO_POM14.description: Port Output Mode Register 14, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 14 pins.

GPIO_POM15.description: Port Output Mode Register 15, selects N-channel open-drain or CMOS output mode for Port 15 pins.

GPIO_PMC0.description: Port Mode Control Register 0, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 0 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC1.description: Port Mode Control Register 1, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 1 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC2.description: Port Mode Control Register 2, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 2 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC3.description: Port Mode Control Register 3, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 3 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC4.description: Port Mode Control Register 4, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 4 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC5.description: Port Mode Control Register 5, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 5 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC6.description: Port Mode Control Register 6, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 6 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC7.description: Port Mode Control Register 7, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 7 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC12.description: Port Mode Control Register 12, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 12 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC13.description: Port Mode Control Register 13, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 13 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC14.description: Port Mode Control Register 14, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 14 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PMC15.description: Port Mode Control Register 15, enables/disables digital input buffer for Port 15 pins and selects alternate functions.

GPIO_PIOR0.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 0, redirects peripheral I/O functions to different pins.

GPIO_PIOR1.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 1, redirects peripheral I/O functions to different pins.

GPIO_PIOR2.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 2, redirects peripheral I/O functions to different pins.

GPIO_PIOR3.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 3, redirects peripheral I/O functions to different pins.

GPIO_GDIDIS.description: Global Digital Input Disable Register, disables digital input buffers for all pins.

ADC_ADM0.description: AD Converter Mode Register 0, configures the operation mode of the A/D converter.

ADC_DR.description: AD Converter Data Register, stores the 10-bit conversion result of the A/D converter (lower byte at 0xFF10, higher byte at 0xFF11).

ADC_SR.description: AD Converter Status Register, indicates the status of the A/D converter operations.

ADC_ICR.description: AD Interrupt Control Register, configures interrupt settings for the A/D converter.

ADC_PCR.description: AD Port Configuration Register, configures analog input functionality for A/D converter pins.

ADC_PCRL.description: AD Port Configuration Register L, lower byte configuration for A/D converter pins.

DAC_CH0_CSR.description: DA Converter Setting Register 0, configures settings for DA converter channel 0.

DAC_CH1_CSR.description: DA Converter Setting Register 1, configures settings for DA converter channel 1.

DAC_CSR.description: DA Converter Setting Register, general configuration register for the DA converter unit.

DAC_SETUPCR.description: DA Converter Setup Control Register, controls the setup and operation of the DA converter.

I2C0_CR.description: I2C Bus Control Register 0, controls the operation of I2C channel 0.

I2C0_DR.description: I2C Bus Data Register 0, holds data for I2C transmission or reception for channel 0.

I2C0_BSCL.description: I2C Bus Status Control Register L, lower byte of status and control for I2C channel 0.

I2C0_BSCH.description: I2C Bus Status Control Register H, higher byte of status and control for I2C channel 0.

I2C0_SAR.description: I2C Bus Slave Address Register 0, configures the slave address for I2C channel 0.

I2C0_FCR.description: I2C Bus Function Control Register 0, configures functional settings for I2C channel 0.

I2C0_BCR0.description: I2C Bus Control Register C0, additional control settings for I2C channel 0.

I2C0_BBR0.description: I2C Bus Bit Rate Register B0, sets the bit rate for I2C communication on channel 0.

SAU0_SDR00.description: Serial Data Register 00, stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit channel 00 (typically configured as CSI/SPI).

SAU0_SMR00.description: Serial Mode Register 00, configures the operation mode for Serial Array Unit channel 00 (e.g., CSI/SPI).

SAU0_SCR00.description: Serial Control Register 00, controls operations for Serial Array Unit channel 00 (e.g., CSI/SPI).

SAU0_SSR00.description: Serial Status Register 00, indicates the status of Serial Array Unit channel 00 (e.g., CSI/SPI).

SAU0_SIR00.description: Serial Input Register 00, indicates receive error status for Serial Array Unit channel 00 (e.g., CSI/SPI).

SAU0_SDR01.description: Serial Data Register 01, stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit channel 01 (typically configured as UART).

SAU0_SMR01.description: Serial Mode Register 01, configures the operation mode for Serial Array Unit channel 01 (e.g., UART).

SAU0_SCR01.description: Serial Control Register 01, controls operations for Serial Array Unit channel 01 (e.g., UART).

SAU0_SSR01.description: Serial Status Register 01, indicates the status of Serial Array Unit channel 01 (e.g., UART).

SAU0_SIR01.description: Serial Input Register 01, indicates receive error status for Serial Array Unit channel 01 (e.g., UART).

SAU1_SDR10.description: Serial Data Register 10, stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit channel 10 (configurable as UART or CSI/SPI).

SAU1_SMR10.description: Serial Mode Register 10, configures the operation mode for Serial Array Unit channel 10 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU1_SCR10.description: Serial Control Register 10, controls operations for Serial Array Unit channel 10 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU1_SSR10.description: Serial Status Register 10, indicates the status of Serial Array Unit channel 10 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU1_SIR10.description: Serial Input Register 10, indicates receive error status for Serial Array Unit channel 10 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU1_SDR11.description: Serial Data Register 11, stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit channel 11.

SAU1_SMR11.description: Serial Mode Register 11, configures the operation mode for Serial Array Unit channel 11.

SAU1_SCR11.description: Serial Control Register 11, controls operations for Serial Array Unit channel 11.

SAU1_SSR11.description: Serial Status Register 11, indicates the status of Serial Array Unit channel 11.

SAU1_SIR11.description: Serial Input Register 11, indicates receive error status for Serial Array Unit channel 11.

SAU2_SDR20.description: Serial Data Register 20, stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit channel 20 (configurable as UART or CSI/SPI).

SAU2_SMR20.description: Serial Mode Register 20, configures the operation mode for Serial Array Unit channel 20 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU2_SCR20.description: Serial Control Register 20, controls operations for Serial Array Unit channel 20 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU2_SSR20.description: Serial Status Register 20, indicates the status of Serial Array Unit channel 20 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU2_SIR20.description: Serial Input Register 20, indicates receive error status for Serial Array Unit channel 20 (e.g., UART, CSI/SPI).

SAU2_SDR21.description: Serial Data Register 21, stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit channel 21.

SAU2_SMR21.description: Serial Mode Register 21, configures the operation mode for Serial Array Unit channel 21.

SAU2_SCR21.description: Serial Control Register 21, controls operations for Serial Array Unit channel 21.

SAU2_SSR21.description: Serial Status Register 21, indicates the status of Serial Array Unit channel 21.

SAU2_SIR21.description: Serial Input Register 21, indicates receive error status for Serial Array Unit channel 21.

SERIAL_SE.description: Serial Channel Enable Register, enables/disables serial communication channels of the Serial Array Unit.

SERIAL_SS.description: Serial Channel Start Register, starts serial communication for selected channels.

SERIAL_ST.description: Serial Channel Stop Register, stops serial communication for selected channels.

SERIAL_SPS.description: Serial Clock Select Register, selects the clock source for the Serial Array Unit.

SERIAL_SO.description: Serial Output Register, controls the output data level of serial output pins.

SERIAL_SOE.description: Serial Output Enable Register, enables/disables serial output functionality for pins.

SERIAL_SMM0.description: Serial Mode Register M0, provides master control for specific serial modes.

RCC_CMC.description: Clock Operation Mode Control Register, configures the main system and subsystem clock operation modes.

RCC_CKC.description: System Clock Control Register, controls the selection and division of the CPU and main system clocks.

RCC_CSC.description: Clock Operation Status Control Register, indicates the status of clock oscillators and enables/disables them.

RCC_OSTC.description: Oscillation Stabilization Time Counter Status Register, indicates the stabilization status of oscillators.

RCC_OSMC.description: Subsystem Clock Supply Mode Control Register, controls the supply mode for the subsystem clock.

RCC_PER0.description: Peripheral Enable Register 0, enables/disables clock supply to various peripheral functions (e.g. ADC, TAU, SAU).

RCC_PER1.description: Peripheral Enable Register 1, enables/disables clock supply to additional peripheral functions.

RCC_HIOTRM.description: High-Speed On-Chip Oscillator Trimming Register, adjusts the frequency of the high-speed on-chip oscillator.

RCC_HOCODIV.description: High-Speed On-Chip Oscillator Frequency Select Register, selects the frequency division ratio for the high-speed on-chip oscillator.

RCC_CGC.description: Clock Generator Control Register, controls the overall operation of the clock generator.

RCC_OSCCTL.description: Oscillation Control Register, controls the operation of various internal oscillators.

TAU0_TMR00.description: Timer Mode Register 00, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 0.

TAU0_TMR01.description: Timer Mode Register 01, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 1.

TAU0_TMR02.description: Timer Mode Register 02, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 2.

TAU0_TMR03.description: Timer Mode Register 03, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 3.

TAU0_TMR04.description: Timer Mode Register 04, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 4.

TAU0_TMR05.description: Timer Mode Register 05, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 5.

TAU0_TMR06.description: Timer Mode Register 06, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 6.

TAU0_TMR07.description: Timer Mode Register 07, configures the operation mode for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 7.

TAU0_TDR00.description: Timer Data Register 00, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 0 (lower byte at 0xFF90, higher byte at 0xFF91).

TAU0_TDR01.description: Timer Data Register 01, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 1 (lower byte at 0xFF92, higher byte at 0xFF93).

TAU0_TDR02.description: Timer Data Register 02, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 2 (lower byte at 0xFF94, higher byte at 0xFF95).

TAU0_TDR03.description: Timer Data Register 03, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 3 (lower byte at 0xFF96, higher byte at 0xFF97).

TAU0_TDR04.description: Timer Data Register 04, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 4 (lower byte at 0xFF98, higher byte at 0xFF99).

TAU0_TDR05.description: Timer Data Register 05, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 5 (lower byte at 0xFF9A, higher byte at 0xFF9B).

TAU0_TDR06.description: Timer Data Register 06, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 6 (lower byte at 0xFF9C, higher byte at 0xFF9D).

TAU0_TDR07.description: Timer Data Register 07, stores data for comparison or capture for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 7 (lower byte at 0xFF9E, higher byte at 0xFF9F).

TAU0_TCR00.description: Timer Count Register 00, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 0 (lower byte at 0xFFA0, higher byte at 0xFFA1).

TAU0_TCR01.description: Timer Count Register 01, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 1 (lower byte at 0xFFA2, higher byte at 0xFFA3).

TAU0_TCR02.description: Timer Count Register 02, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 2 (lower byte at 0xFFA4, higher byte at 0xFFA5).

TAU0_TCR03.description: Timer Count Register 03, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 3 (lower byte at 0xFFA6, higher byte at 0xFFA7).

TAU0_TCR04.description: Timer Count Register 04, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 4 (lower byte at 0xFFA8, higher byte at 0xFFA9).

TAU0_TCR05.description: Timer Count Register 05, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 5 (lower byte at 0xFFAA, higher byte at 0xFFAB).

TAU0_TCR06.description: Timer Count Register 06, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 6 (lower byte at 0xFFAC, higher byte at 0xFFAD).

TAU0_TCR07.description: Timer Count Register 07, holds the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, channel 7 (lower byte at 0xFFAE, higher byte at 0xFFAF).

TAU0_TPS.description: Timer Clock Select Register 0, selects the count clock for Timer Array Unit 0.

TAU_ISC.description: Input Switch Control Register, configures input switches for various timer and external interrupt functions.

TAU_NFEN1.description: Noise Filter Enable Register 1, enables/disables noise filters for Timer Array Unit 0 input pins (TI00-TI07).

TAU0_TO.description: Timer Output Register 0, controls the output level of Timer Array Unit 0 output pins (TO00-TO07).

TAU0_TOE.description: Timer Output Enable Register 0, enables/disables output functionality for Timer Array Unit 0 output pins (TO00-TO07).

TAU0_TOL.description: Timer Output Level Register 0, selects the initial output level for Timer Array Unit 0 output pins (TO00-TO07).

TAU0_TOM.description: Timer Output Mode Register 0, selects output mode for Timer Array Unit 0 output pins (TO00-TO07).

TAU0_TSR00.description: Timer Status Register 00, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 0.

TAU0_TSR01.description: Timer Status Register 01, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 1.

TAU0_TSR02.description: Timer Status Register 02, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 2.

TAU0_TSR03.description: Timer Status Register 03, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 3.

TAU0_TSR04.description: Timer Status Register 04, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 4.

TAU0_TSR05.description: Timer Status Register 05, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 5.

TAU0_TSR06.description: Timer Status Register 06, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 6.

TAU0_TSR07.description: Timer Status Register 07, indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, channel 7.

TAU0_TE.description: Timer Channel Enable Status Register 0, indicates the enable status of Timer Array Unit 0 channels (TE00-TE07).

TAU0_TS.description: Timer Channel Start Register 0, starts selected channels of Timer Array Unit 0 (TS00-TS07).

TAU0_TT.description: Timer Channel Stop Register 0, stops selected channels of Timer Array Unit 0 (TT00-TT07).

TAU0_TIOS.description: Timer I/O Select Register 0, selects input/output mode for Timer Array Unit 0 channels (TI00-TI07/TO00-TO07).

TIMER0_TRC.description: Timer Register Control Register 0, controls specific aspects of Timer 0 (lower byte at 0xFE90, higher byte at 0xFE91).

TIMER0_TRD.description: Timer Register Data Register 0, holds data for Timer 0 (lower byte at 0xFE92, higher byte at 0xFE93).

TIMER1_TRC.description: Timer Register Control Register 1, controls specific aspects of Timer 1 (lower byte at 0xFE94, higher byte at 0xFE95).

TIMER1_TRD.description: Timer Register Data Register 1, holds data for Timer 1 (lower byte at 0xFE96, higher byte at 0xFE97).

TIMER2_TRC.description: Timer Register Control Register 2, controls specific aspects of Timer 2 (lower byte at 0xFE98, higher byte at 0xFE99).

TIMER2_TRD.description: Timer Register Data Register 2, holds data for Timer 2 (lower byte at 0xFE9A, higher byte at 0xFE9B).

TIMER3_TRC.description: Timer Register Control Register 3, controls specific aspects of Timer 3 (lower byte at 0xFE9C, higher byte at 0xFE9D).

TIMER3_TRD.description: Timer Register Data Register 3, holds data for Timer 3 (lower byte at 0xFE9E, higher byte at 0xFE9F).

TIMER_TRGCR.description: Timer Gate Control Register, controls the gate input for timers.

TIMER_TRGM.description: Timer Gate Mode Register, configures the operation mode of the timer gate.

TIMER_TRGPWM.description: Timer Gate PWM Register, configures PWM output using the timer gate.

TIMER_TRGCNT.description: Timer Gate Count Register, holds the count value related to the timer gate.

TIMER_TIS0.description: Timer Input Select Register 0, selects input sources for timer channels.

TIMER_TIS1.description: Timer Input Select Register 1, selects input sources for timer channels.

TIMER_TIS2.description: Timer Input Select Register 2, selects input sources for timer channels.

TIMER_TIS3.description: Timer Input Select Register 3, selects input sources for timer channels.

CRC_CR.description: CRC Control Register, controls the operation of the CRC calculation unit.

CRC_DR.description: CRC Data Register, holds the calculated CRC value or initial value (lower byte at 0xFF60, higher byte at 0xFF61).

CRC_IR.description: CRC Input Register, provides data input for CRC calculation.

COMP_LR.description: Comparator Latch Register, latches the output of the comparator.

COMP_MDR.description: Comparator Mode Register, configures the operation mode of the comparator.

COMP_FIR.description: Comparator Filter Register, configures the digital filter for the comparator output.

COMP_OCR.description: Comparator Output Control Register, controls the output behavior of the comparator.

NF_EN0.description: Noise Filter Enable Register 0, enables/disables noise filters for general purpose inputs.

SYSTEM_RMC.description: Reset Mode Control Register, controls aspects of the reset operation and state.

FLASH_PRDCR.description: Program Flash Memory Read Control Register, controls read operations from program flash memory.

FLASH_EN.description: Flash Memory Control Register (FLEN), controls various flash memory operations.

FLASH_DSDP.description: Data Flash Memory Standby Program Register, controls data flash memory programming in standby mode.

FLASH_DSAD.description: Data Flash Memory Address Register, specifies the address for data flash memory access.

FLASH_DRAD.description: Data Flash Memory Data Register, holds data for data flash memory programming/reading.

FLASH_PMC.description: Flash Memory Program Mode Control Register, controls the programming mode of the flash memory.

FLASH_SEC.description: Flash Memory Security Setting Register, configures security settings for flash memory.

FLASH_RST.description: Flash Memory Reset Register, initiates a reset operation for the flash memory controller.

FLASH_ERR.description: Flash Memory Error Register, indicates error status during flash memory operations.

FLASH_MWL.description: Flash Memory Write Limit Register L, defines the lower write limit address for flash memory (lower byte at 0xFE65, higher byte at 0xFE66).

FLASH_MWH.description: Flash Memory Write Limit Register H, defines the higher write limit address for flash memory (part of 16-bit FLMWL).

MATH_MDCL.description: Multiply/Divide Control Register L, lower byte of the control register for the hardware multiplier/divider.

MATH_MDCH.description: Multiply/Divide Control Register H, higher byte of the control register for the hardware multiplier/divider.

MATH_MDMH.description: Multiply/Divide Register H (MDMH), stores higher byte of multiplier/dividend or result for the hardware multiplier/divider.

MATH_MDML.description: Multiply/Divide Register L (MDML), stores lower byte of multiplier/dividend or result for the hardware multiplier/divider.

MATH_MDUH.description: Multiply/Divide Register H (MDUH), stores higher byte of multiplier/dividend for the hardware multiplier/divider.

MATH_MDUL.description: Multiply/Divide Register L (MDUL), stores lower byte of multiplier/dividend for the hardware multiplier/divider.

WDT_EN.description: Watchdog Timer Enable Register, enables the watchdog timer.

WDT_MODER.description: Watchdog Timer Mode Register, configures the operation mode of the watchdog timer.

WDT_CLR.description: Watchdog Timer Clear Register, clears the watchdog timer counter.

WDT_FR.description: Watchdog Timer Function Register, provides additional control or status for the watchdog timer.

RTC_CR0.description: Real-Time Clock Control Register 0, controls the basic operation of the Real-Time Clock.

RTC_CR1.description: Real-Time Clock Control Register 1, provides additional control for the Real-Time Clock.

RTC_SEC.description: Real-Time Clock Second Register, stores the current second value.

RTC_MIN.description: Real-Time Clock Minute Register, stores the current minute value.

RTC_HOUR.description: Real-Time Clock Hour Register, stores the current hour value.

RTC_DAY.description: Real-Time Clock Day Register, stores the current day value.

RTC_MON.description: Real-Time Clock Month Register, stores the current month value.

RTC_WEK.description: Real-Time Clock Week Register, stores the current day of the week value.

RTC_YEAR.description: Real-Time Clock Year Register, stores the current year value.

SYSTEM_IAWCT.description: Instruction Accelerator Wait Control Register, configures wait cycles for the instruction accelerator.

DEBUG_CR.description: On-Chip Debugging System Disable Register, disables the on-chip debugging system.

INT_FLAG_CTL.description: Interrupt Flag Control Register, controls the setting and clearing of interrupt flags.

INT_FLAG_CLR.description: Interrupt Flag Clear Register, clears specific interrupt flags.
